Have we figured out Kung Fu Kick yet?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Monster Types: Hare: Have we figured out Kung Fu Kick yet?
By PezCat on Tuesday, July 25, 2000 - 03:29 pm:

Hey guys...

I'm currently raising one of these little guys, and I was wondering... the tech list we have isn't
entirely sure about how to go about getting the Kung Fu Kick tech. Does anyone have the
definitive response on this? So far, this is what I have heard:

Kung Fu Fist x 50 + Spin Kick x 50 --> Kung Fu Kick

Now, this is a little odd, because I opened up Kung Fu Blow by using Kung Fu Fist... in fact I
started with both on this hare (Caer Bannog, the Scaled Hare, had a whopping 9 techs to start
with!) . I would think the stronger move, Kung Fu Blow, would be more likely to be required,
but I could easily be wrong. If it helps, here's the techs I have:

4th Range: None (I don't think Hares even have any... please correct me if I'm wrong)
3rd Range: 1-2 Punch, Gas (Other than Foul Gas, are there any others here?)
2nd Range: Back Blow, Rolling Blow, Smash, High Kick, Spin Kick
1st Range: Straight, Hard Straight, Kung Fu Fist, Kung Fu Blow

Can no longer get a tech at the Speed (Papas) or the Hit (Torble) errantries... And the next
Heavy (Mandy) tech is currently locked.

I don't even know what range Kung Fu Kick is in, let alone where I go to get it, or the exact
things for the requirement. Any help is appreciated.

PezCat
